R

releaseDice() - Method in class farklegame.Dice
Release rectangles sets rectangles being held to FALSE.
resetHand() - Method in class farkleapp.Model
This method calls logic.resetRound and sets all of the rList' effects to null (not held or clicked anymore).
resetHandTest() - Method in class testing.FarkleModelTest
This method tests resetHand method in Model.
resetRound(ArrayList<Dice>) - Method in class farklegame.FarkleDiceLogic
Returns all dice to default state, not held and active, and then rerolls them.
roll() - Method in class farklegame.Dice
Rolls the rectangles.
rollHandStatus(ArrayList<Dice>) - Method in class farklegame.FarkleDiceLogic
rollHandStatus will go through the hand of dice passed to it and change held dice to inactive dice, and then roll active dice.
rollTheDiceButtonPushed(ActionEvent) - Method in class farkleapp.Controller
This method handles the ActionEvent generated by pressing the "Roll Dice" button within the application.
rollTheDiceButtonPushed(ActionEvent) - Method in interface farkleapp.FarkleControllerInterface
Implementation explained in farkleapp.Controller.
rollTheDiceButtonPushed(ActionEvent) - Method in class testing.FakeController
 
rollTheDiceButtonPushedTest() - Method in class testing.ControllerTest
This test determines whether or not the rollDice method used to capture ActionEvents is actually able to roll the dice.
